meanings.definition: Chewie (noun): A type of chewy candy.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat chewie after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chewie was so sweet and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The chewie made my mouth happy.
meanings.sent4: The chewie was like a sugary cloud in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The chewie melted in my mouth like magic.

meanings.definition: Chewie (adjective): Having a texture that requires chewing.
meanings.sent1: The steak was so chewie, I had to chew for a long time.
meanings.sent2: The bubblegum was very chewie and fun to chew.
meanings.sent3: The chewie bread made me work for my meal.
meanings.sent4: The chewie caramel was like a workout for my jaw.
meanings.sent5: The chewie jerky was tough but tasty.
